The Boy with Balloon Hands: A story about a boy who his hands into balloons and goes on a journey to find the world's most balloon.
The Boy with Balloon Hands: A superhero story where the boy uses his unique ability to turn his hands into balloons to fight crime and protect his city.
The Boy with Balloon Hands: A comedy where the boy accidentally turns his hands into balloons and has to find a way to turn them back before they pop.
The Boy with Balloon Hands: A horror story where the boy's ability to turn his hands into balloons is cursed and he must find a way to break the curse before it him.
The Boy with Balloon Hands: A fantasy story where the boy discovers that he is the only one who can control balloons and must use his powers to save the kingdom from an evil sorcerer.
